participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and vivacious, I love to live life to the fullest. I'm a bit of a perfectionist and can be quite particular about my choices.
participant_1.background: i diet a lot. i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money.

participant_2.name: Lukas
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and easygoing, I enjoy trying new things and exploring the world around me. I'm passionate about healthy living and love to be active.
participant_2.background: i'm not a good swimmer at all. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving.
